title: Shooting Saturday afternoon critically injures 1 person
content: KANSAS CITY, Mo. —  Kansas City police are investigating a shooting Saturday afternoon that critically injured one person.    Police officers were called at 1:40 p.m. to 80th Street and Troost Avenue after receiving several reports of shots fired in the area.          Authorities found one victim near Forest Avenue. That person was taken to a hospital for treatment.    No arrests were announced.
